title: BLACK+DECKER Slip Joint Pliers, 2 Pack (BDHT84001)
description: The BLACK+DECKER Groove Joint Pliers 2 Pack features 8 in. and 12 in. pliers and is a must have in any toolbox. Ideal for holding and turning nuts, bolts or pipes of different sizes so you can confidently tackle that kitchen sink plumbing leak or simply use for opening a tightly sealed jar. The groove joint in these pliers allows you to adjust the grip of the plier jaws to suit the job you are working on while the drop forged steel construction provides strength and durability. The oil-resistant double dipped grips provide a comfortable grip.
